Configuration.Name: Alma Barcode Lookup
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: Performs an Alma Item lookup with the item's barcode and imports the results.

Setting.name: Alma API URL
Setting.Description: The URL to the Alma API

Setting.name: Alma API Key
Setting.Description: API key used for interacting with the Alma API.

Setting.name: Allow Overwrite With Blank Value
Setting.Description: Blank values returned from the lookup response will overwrite existing information in the field.

Setting.name: Fields to Import
Setting.value: CallNumber, ISXN, Title, Author, Edition, Place, Pages, Publisher
Setting.Description: The list of fields to import from the API response.

Setting.name: Field to Perform Lookup With
Setting.Description: The field that is used to perform the Alma Item lookup. The first value is the table in the database the second is the column.
